summary:
This mod adds the following to the Skyrim world.

- Dark Headsman Gear Armor Set(re-color,and playable)
- Custom Duel Headed Executioner Axe
- Custom One Handed Executioner War Axe

The Headsman Armor is only available for a male character at the moment. But I am currently working on a female set.
Also, the Headsman hood was not designed for
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static2.nexusmods.com/110/images/110/1520317-1338877234.jpg[/img]

[color=yellow][b]What This Mod Does[/b][/color]
[color=yellow][b]================[/b][/color]

This mod adds the following to the Skyrim world.

- Dark Headsman Gear Armor Set(re-color,and playable)
- Custom Duel Headed Executioner Axe
- Custom One Handed Executioner War Axe

The Headsman Armor is only available for a male character at the moment. But I am currently working on a female set.
Also, the Headsman hood was not designed for a Khajiit or an Argonian. It may look a bit funny if these races wear it.


[color=yellow][b]Location[/b][/color]
[color=yellow][b]=======[/b][/color]

You can find the gear, and the weapons in Solitude. The armor, and the one handed war axe,is in a locked chest(apprentice difficulty to pick) near the executioner chopping block.
The duel headed headsman axe is on the table in the same area.


[color=yellow][b]Crafting[/b][/color]
[color=yellow][b]======[/b][/color]

Both weapons are craftable and upgradeable at a forge and sharpening wheel.

[color=yellow]Forge:[/color]
Duel Headed Executioner Axe - 2 iron ingots, 2 leather Strips, 2 firewood
One Handed Executioner War Axe, 1 iron ingot, 1 leather strips, 1 firewood

[color=yellow]Sharpen:[/color]
Duel Headed Executioner Axe - 1 iron ingots
One Handed Executioner War Axe, 1 iron ingot

The armor set is not craftable.(maybe in a future update)


[color=yellow][b]INSTALL[/b][/color]
[color=yellow][b]======[/b][/color]

Option 1: Use Nexus Mod Manager to install for you automatically

Option 2: Manually install by unzipping the compressed file, merge the Data file with the
          Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data directory
          Then check off the new .esp in the Data section when you first start your game.

[color=yellow][b]UN-INSTALL[/b][/color]
[color=yellow][b]=========[/b][/color]

Option 1: Use Nexus Mod Manager to un-install automatically

Option 2: Manually remove the DoubleBladeExecutionerAxe folder located in the
          steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\meshes diectory. And remove the
          DoubleHeadExecutionerAxe.esp from the Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data directory


[color=yellow][b]CREDITS[/b][/color]
[color=yellow][b]======[/b][/color]

clintmich - Mod Author

Bethesda - For another great game and the Creation Kit

Gamers - For downloading, endorsing, and playing the mods I create. Kudos to all of you!

My Girlfriend - For putting up with my many hours of modding(She hates it when I credit her, but I am anyway)

Blender Foundation - For an awesome free modeling program

GIMP - For an awesome free image manipulation program

Nifskope - For an awesome free 3D model editor


[color=yellow][b]And special thanks to Nexus Sites for the wonderful modding community they provide![/b][/color]

[color=yellow][b]Thank You![/b][/color]
author: clintmich
